Verses: 1 paskaapandigai Vara Aarunaalaikkumunne Yesu Thaam Maranaththilirundhu Ezhuppina Laasaru Irundha Peththaaniyaavukku Vandhaar.
2 ange Avarukku Raavirundhu Panninaargal; Maarththaal Panividai Seydhaal; Laasaruvum Avarudane Koodappandhiyirundhavargalil Oruvanaayirundhaan.

3 appozhudhu Mariyaal Vilaiyerappetra Kalangamillaadha Naladham Ennum Thailaththil Oru Raaththal Konduvandhu, Adhai Yesuvin Paadhangalil Poosi, Than Thalaimayiraal Avarudaiya Paadhangalaith Thudaiththaal; Andha Veedu Muzhuvadhum Thailaththin Parimalaththinaal Niraindhadhu.
4 appozhudhu Avarudaiya Seesharil Oruvanum Avaraik Kaattikkodukkappogiravanumaagiya Seemonudaiya Kumaaranaana Yoodhaaskaariyoththu:
5 indhath Thailaththai Munnooru Panaththukku Vitru, Thariththirarukkuk Kodaamal Ponadhenna Endraan.
6 avan Thariththiraraik Kuriththuk Kavalaippattu Ippadi Sollaamal, Avan Thirudanaanapadiyinaalum, Panappaiyai Vaiththukkondu Adhile Podappattadhai Sumakkiravanaanapadiyinaalum Ippadi Sonnaan.
7 appozhudhu Yesu: Ivalai Vittuvidu, Ennai Adakkampannum Naalukkaaga Idhai Vaiththirundhaal.
8 thariththirar Eppozhudhum Ungalidaththil Irukkiraargal; Naan Eppozhudhum Ungalidaththil Iren Endraar.
9 appozhudhu Yoodharil Thiralaana Janangal Avar Angeyirukkiradhai Arindhu, Yesuvinimiththamaaga Maaththiram Alla, Avar Mariththorilirundhezhuppina Laasaruvaik Kaanumpadiyaagavum Vandhaargal.
10 laasaruvinimiththamaaga Yoodhargalil Anegar Poi, Yesuvinidaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththapadiyaal,
11 pradhaana Aasaariyargal Laasaruvaiyum Kolaiseyya Aalosanaipanninaargal.
12 marunaalile Yesu Erusalemukku Varugiraarendru Pandigaikku Vandha Thiralaana Janangal Kelvippattu,
13 kuruththolaigalaip Pidiththukkondu, Avarukku Edhirkondupogumpadi Purappattu: Osannaa, Karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Varugira Isravelin Raajaa Sthoththirikkappattavar Endru Aarppariththaargal.
14 allaamalum: Seeyon Kumaaraththiye, Bayappadaadhe, Un Raajaa Kazhudhaikkuttiyinmel Erivarugiraar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkira Pragaaramaaga,
15 yesu Oru Kazhudhaikkuttiyaik Kandu Adhinmel Eripponaar.

16 ivaigalai Avarudaiya Seeshargal Thuvakkaththile Ariyavillai. Yesu Magimaiyadaindha Pinbu, Ippadi Avaraik Kuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkiradhaiyum, Thaangal Ippadi Avarukku Seydhadhaiyum Ninaivukoorndhaargal.
17 andriyum Avarudanekooda Irundha Janangal Avar Laasaruvaik Kallaraiyilirundhu Veliye Varavazhaiththu, Avanai Uyirode Ezhuppinaarendru Saatchikoduththaargal.
18 appadippatta Arpudhaththai Avar Seydhaar Endru Janangal Kelvippattadhinaal Avargal Avarukku Edhirkonduponaargal.
19 appozhudhu Pariseyar Oruvaraiyoruvar Nokki: Neengal Seygiradhellaam Veenendru Arigiradhillaiyaa? Idho, Ulagame Avanukkup Pinsendru Poyitre Endraargal.
20 pandigaiyil Aaraadhanai Seyya Vandhavargalil Sila Grekkar Irundhaargal.
21 avargal Galileyaanaattup Pedhsaayidhaa Ooraanaagiya Pilippuvinidaththil Vandhu: Aiyaa, Yesuvaik Kaana Virumbugirom Endru Avanaik Kettukkondaargal.
22 pilippu Vandhu, Adhai Andhireyaavukku Ariviththaan; Pinbu Andhireyaavum Pilippuvum Adhai Yesuvukku Ariviththaargal.
23 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Manushakumaaran Magimaippadumpadiyaana Velai Vandhadhu.
24 meyyaagave Meyyaagave Naan Ungalukku Sollugiren, Godhumai Maniyaanadhu Nilaththil Vizhundhu Saagaavittaal Thaniththirukkum, Seththadheyaagil Migundha Palanaikkodukkum.
25 than Jeevanai Snegikkiravan Adhai Izhandhupovaan; Indha Ulagaththil Than Jeevanai Verukkiravano Adhai Niththiya Jeevakaalamaaik Kaaththukkolluvaan.
26 oruvan Enakku Oozhiyancheygiravanaanaal Ennaip Pinpatrakkadavan, Naan Enge Irukkireno Ange En Oozhiyakkaaranum Iruppaan; Oruvan Enakku Oozhiyancheydhaal Avanaip Pidhaavaanavar Ganampannuvaar.
27 ippozhudhu En Aaththumaa Kalangugiradhu, Naan Enna Solluven. Pidhaave, Indha Velaiyinindru Ennai Ratchiyum Endru Solveno; Aagilum, Idharkaagave Indha Velaikkul Vandhen.
28 pidhaave, Umadhu Naamaththai Magimaippaduththum Endraar. Appozhudhu: Magimaippaduththinen, Innamum Magimaippaduththuven Engira Saththam Vaanaththilirundhu Undaayitru.
29 ange Nindru Kondirundhu, Adhaik Ketta Janangal: Idimuzhakkamundaayitru Endraargal. Verusilar: Dhevathoodhan Avarudane Pesinaan Endraargal.
30 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Indha Saththam Ennimiththam Undaagaamal Ungal Nimiththame Undaayitru.
31 ippozhudhe Indha Ulagaththukku Nyaayaththeerppu Undaagiradhu; Ippozhudhe Indha Ulagaththin Adhipadhi Purambaagath Thallappaduvaan.
32 naan Boomiyilirundhu Uyarththappattirukkumbodhu, Ellaaraiyum Ennidaththil Izhuththukkolluven Endraar.
33 thaam Innavidhamaana Maranamaai Marikkappogiraarenbadhaik Kurikkumpadi Ippadi Sonnaar.

34 janangal Avarai Nokki: Kristhu Endrendraikkum Irukkiraar Endru Vedhaththil Solliyadhai Naangal Kettirukkirom, Appadiyirukka Manushakumaaran Uyarththappadavendiyadhendru Eppadi Sollugireer; Indha Manushakumaaran Yaar Endraargal.
35 adharku Yesu: Innum Konjakkaalam Oli Ungalidaththil Irukkum; Irulil Neengal Agappadaadhapadikku Oli Ungalodirukkaiyil Nadavungal; Irulil Nadakkiravan Thaan Pogira Idam Innadhendru Ariyaan.
36 oli Ungalodirukkaiyil Neengal Oliyin Pillaigalaagumpadikku, Oliyinidaththil Visuvaasamaayirungal Endraar. Ivaigalai Yesu Solli, Avargalai Vittu Maraindhaar.
37 avar Iththanai Arpudhangalai Avargalukku Munbaaga Seydhirundhum, Avargal Avarai Visuvaasikkavillai.
38 karththaave, Engal Moolamaaik Kelvippattadhai Visuvaasiththavan Yaar? Karththarudaiya Buyam Yaarukku Velippattadhu Endru Esaayaa Theerkkadharisi Sonna Vasanam Niraiverumpadi Ippadi Nadandhadhu.
39 aagaiyaal Avargal Visuvaasikkamaattaamal Ponaargal. Enenil Esaayaa Pinnum:

40 avargal Kangalinaal Kaanaamalum, Irudhayaththinaal Unaraamalum, Gunappadaamalum Irukkumpadikkum, Naan Avargalai Aarokkiyamaakkaamal Irukkumpadikkum, Avargaludaiya Kangalai Avar Kurudaakki, Avargal Irudhayaththaik Kadinamaakkinaar Endraan.
41 esaayaa Avarudaiya Magimaiyaikkandu, Avaraik Kuriththup Pesugirapodhu Ivaigalai Sonnaan.
42 aagilum Adhigaarigalilum Anegar Avaridaththil Visuvaasam Vaiththaargal. Appadiyirundhum Jebaaalayaththukkup Purambaakkappadaadhapadi, Pariseyar Nimiththam Adhai Arikkaipannaadhirundhaargal.
43 avargal Dhevanaal Varugira Magimaiyilum Manusharaal Varugira Magimaiyai Adhigamaai Virumbinaargal.
44 appozhudhu Yesu Saththamittu: Ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravan Ennidaththil Alla, Ennai Anuppinavaridaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiraan.
45 ennaik Kaangiravan Ennai Anuppinavaraik Kaangiraan.
46 ennidaththil Visuvaasamaayirukkiravanevanum Irulil Iraadhapadikku, Naan Ulagaththil Oliyaaga Vandhen.
47 oruvan En Vaarththaigalaik Kettum Visuvaasiyaamarponaal, Avanai Naan Nyaayantheerppadhillai; Naan Ulagaththai Nyaayantheerkkavaraamal, Ulagaththai Ratchikkavandhen.
48 ennaith Thalli En Vaarththaigalai Etrukkollaadhavanai Nyaayantheerkkiradhondrirukkiradhu; Naan Sonna Vasaname Avanaik Kadaisinaalil Nyaayantheerkkum.
49 naan Suyamaaip Pesavillai, Naan Pesavendiyadhu Innadhendrum Ubadhesikkavendiyadhu Innadhendrum Ennai Anuppina Pidhaave Enakkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
50 avarudaiya Kattalai Niththiya Jeevanaayirukkiradhendru Ariven; Aagaiyaal Naan Pesugiravaigalaip Pidhaa Enakku Sonnapadiye Pesugiren Endraar.
